decode

public static PlotBuilder decode(java.net.URI parentURI,
                                 LexicalUnit value)
                          throws java.io.IOException,
                                 ParseException
Decodes the passed LexicalUnit into a plot builder.

Parameters:
parentURI - The uri to look for the file if the name in the LexicalUnit lists a relative file name.
value - The LexicalUnit to decode.
Returns:
A PlotBuilder defining the actual data points to plot out.
Throws:
MalformedDeclarationException
MalformedPlotDataException
java.io.IOException
ParseException
